author: jm
msg: some changes in response to comment 14 in bug 4477.
- use NI_NUMERICSERV to list port numbers instead of names;
- use NI_MAXHOST and NI_MAXSERV where available;
- use getaddrinfo()'s built-in support for resolving the loopback address,
however the max-hosts issue and the _randomize_hosts() issue are
still outstanding; not biggies though I think.

author: rjung
msg: BZ 39933: Fixed division by zero when statistics are calculated,
but no messages have been transmitted.

author: tellison
msg: Beans property change support should ensure the list of listeners

author: felicity
msg: remove references to bugzilla.spamassassin.org, replace with issues.apache.org/SpamAssassin, as well as standardize a bit on 'bug #' as opposed to BZ links for comment sections about a fix, etc.
